title: ive had a dream about dnd and there was some sort of a mechanic about a huge pet wild cat basically you could own a child of it that cant walk on it’s own and you need to carry it and it will do nothing but be heavy and debuff you with being slowed down and some other thing that you get for carrying something heavy and then after some levels it kinda grows up becoming bugger able to walk on it’s own and attack enemies and it was a pretty useful companion so kinda a risk reward huge pet wild cat…
